Content: Anuradhapura Chief Magistrate Janaka Prasanna Samarasinghe today ordered the police to seal a Pharmacy charged with selling illegal drug tablets to school children and youths in the Galenbindunuwewa area in Anuradhapura. The Magistrate has ordered a report to be submitted after examining all the drugs available for sale in the pharmacy. When this particular pharmacy was raided previously, the manager of the pharmacy was arrested with a stock of illegal drugs.
